short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to add Furigana to Duolingo's Kanji.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simply adds Furigana over the sentences on Duolingo.
Multiple modes exist now
Kanji to Hiragana
Kanji to Katakana
All 2 romaji
the tile aren't currently translated.
